Recent additions

Murine B cell repertoires and transcriptomes in response to immunization with a human antigen

  • New study available covering B cells in young and aged mice after immunization with a human recombinant receptor
  • DOI

CD8 T cells in acute, chronic, and latent infections

  • New study available on clonally expanded CD8 T cell dynamics in time during LCMB infection in mice
  • https://doi.org/10.1101/2021.06.29.450285
